009package imagingbook.common.math;
010
011/**
012 * This class holds various settings for the imagingbook library.
013 * @author wilbur
014 *
015 */
016public abstract class PrintPrecision {
017        
018        private PrintPrecision() {}
019        
020        private static int defaultPrecision = 3;
021        private static int precision = defaultPrecision;
022        private static String formatStringFloat;
023        
024        static {
025                 reset();
026        }
027        
028        public static void reset() {
029                set(defaultPrecision);
030        }
031        
032        public static void set(int nDigits) {
033                precision = Math.max(nDigits, 0);
034                if (nDigits > 0) {
035                        formatStringFloat = "%." + precision + "f"; // e.g. "%.5f"
036                }
037                else {
038                        formatStringFloat = "%e";       // use scientific format - OK?
039                }
040        }
041        
042        public static String getFormatStringFloat() {
043                return formatStringFloat;
044        }
045        
046        public static int get() {
047                return precision;
048        }
049
050}
